Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Anti-HAV IgM Reagent Pack
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Anti-HAV IgM Calibrators
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Anti-HAV IgM Controls
Analyte(s): IgM antibody to hepatitis A virus (anti-HAV IgM)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Anti-HAV IgM qualitative immunoassay reagents, calibrators, and controls for detection of IgM antibodies to hepatitis A virus.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of IgM antibody to hepatitis A virus (anti-HAV IgM) in human adult and pediatric serum or plasma using VITROS ECi/ECiQ Immunodiagnostic System for laboratory diagnosis of acute or recent hepatitis A.
